meanings.sent1: She is equalling her sister in height.
meanings.sent2: The two numbers are equalling each other.
meanings.sent3: The race between the tortoise and the hare ended with them equalling each other.
meanings.sent4: The sun equalling the moon in brightness was a rare sight.
meanings.sent5: The twins were equalling each other in every aspect.

meanings.sent1: He is equalling the distribution of candies among the children.
meanings.sent2: The teacher is equalling the opportunities for all students.
meanings.sent3: The chef equalling the portions of food made sure no one went hungry.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness equalling her generosity made her a beloved figure in the community.
meanings.sent5: The ruler equalling the lengths of the lines on the paper.

meanings.sent1: His effort is equalling his success in the project.
meanings.sent2: The value of the dollar is equalling the euro.
meanings.sent3: The laughter equalling the tears showed the emotional rollercoaster of the play.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication equalling her talent made her a formidable competitor.
meanings.sent5: The speed of the car equalling the wind on a stormy day.
